personal.name: Ahmed Jemaa
personal.title: Cloud & DevOps Engineer
personal.subtitle: Seeking 6-Month Internship in Germany
personal.bio: Aspiring Cloud & DevOps Engineer with hands-on experience in AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform, and CI/CD pipelines. Completed 3 internships across Banking, Telecom, and Agriculture sectors, focusing on automation and cloud deployment. Currently seeking a mandatory 6-month internship in Germany to apply these technologies in real-world projects and further expand my DevOps expertise.

experience.title: Full-Stack and DevOps Intern
experience.description: Engineered an AI-enhanced scheduling system and streamlined workflows
achievements: Collaborated with a team of 5 developers to build and deploy a full-stack web application using React.js and Node.js, replacing paper-based customer management and scheduling
Built an intelligent scheduling system to manage room reservations and reduce conflicts, improving efficiency by 40%
Integrated Azure AI for document parsing, eliminating manual data entry by 50% and reducing errors
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, enabling automated testing and code integration, reducing bugs by 30%

experience.title: AWS Cloud Automation Intern
experience.description: Orchestrated a serverless application using AWS services
achievements: Teamed up with one other developer to design and implement a serverless raffle system using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB, automating participant management and winner selection
Streamlined front-end deployment by automating S3 hosting with CloudFront caching, improving availability and reducing manual maintenance
Configured IAM roles, VPC networking, and CloudWatch monitoring to enhance security, enforce access control, and enable real-time system tracking

experience.title: Web Developer IoT Intern
experience.description: Created an IoT-driven web solution for hydroponics management
achievements: Partnered with 2 team members to develop a web application using Angular and Spring Boot, automating hydroponic system monitoring and reducing water consumption by 90%
Integrated IoT sensors for real-time data collection and intelligent adjustments, improving crop yield by 20%

projects.title: EKS Terraform AWS Project
projects.description: Automated the deployment of an Amazon EKS cluster using Terraform (IaC), managing state securely via AWS S3 and DynamoDB for reproducible infrastructure.
highlights: Containerized 3 microservices developed in Golang, Java, and Python using Docker
Configured an Ingress Controller to optimize traffic routing and scalability

projects.title: DevSecOps CI/CD Pipeline for Amazon EKS
projects.description: Automated CI/CD with Jenkins, Docker, and Terraform, deploying on Amazon EKS to handle 3 microservices.
highlights: Configured Kubernetes RBAC for secure cluster access
Integrated a custom domain via load balancer

projects.title: University Reservation System
projects.description: Designed a microservices-based university reservation system using Spring Boot.
highlights: Worked with a team of 5 to design the system architecture
Used Lens for Kubernetes to manage clusters and streamline 4 deployments

achievements.title: Project Manager
achievements.description: Led a cross-functional team of 20, focusing on social entrepreneurship
